Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.34328726]SARS-CoV-2:Inhibition of virus entry in HEK293T/ACE2 cells (via inhibition of SRBD:ACE2 interaction)(IC50=18 ± 2 nM, 95% inhibition at 0.39 µM, 100% inhibition at 25 µM).

Literature.Title: Synthetic Peptides That Antagonize the Angiotensin-Converting Enzyme-2 (ACE-2) Interaction with SARS-CoV-2 Receptor Binding Spike Protein
